intro_questions.text: Can you spell your family name, please?

main_questions.text: What do you wish to learn in school?
What is your favorite thing to wear?
What do you do with your family?

respond_situations.starter_line: What do you want to drink?
respond_situations.description: You are at a café. You need to order a drink.

respond_situations.starter_line: Would you like coffee or tea?

respond_situations.description: You are in a clothing shop. You see a shirt and want to know the price.

respond_situations.starter_line: What do you want to buy?

ask_situations.instruction: You are at school. Ask a friend for help with homework.
You want to help a friend with something. ..
You are shopping. Ask a shopkeeper for the price of a shirt.

listening_script.text: Saying goodbye is important. We say goodbye to friends. We wave and smile. Sometimes we say 'see you later'. It is a nice way to leave.

questions.question: What do we say to friends?

follow_up_questions.question: What is the name of your favorite movie?
Who is the main actor in the movie?
Where do you watch this movie?
Why do you like this movie?
